name: Hierarchy Planning
description:
This is one of the main points I want to be true.
Right now we can create serial plans that contain any kind of plan at each step. But the next thing we need is a separation of concerns.
For example, lm-wumpus always works against the world state, the ideas around wumpus, and lm has actuators at affect the wumpus world.
We need to give lm wumpus a keyboard actuators so that it can press up/down/left/right, which in turn affect the wumpus world by moving the agent.
